name: 2022 The 5th International Conference on Information Science and Systems
content: Publication: Submitted papers will be double blind reviewed by program committees, accepted papers of ICISS 2022 after registration and presentation will be published in the International Conference Proceedings Series by ACM (ISBN: 978-1-4503-9683-7), which will be archived in the ACM Digital Library, and indexed by Ei Compendex,Scopus, etc.
